name: eau de parfum
description:
You have been a loyal perfumer working at the company Parfum (run by the rose-headed Rosalinde). Now, with the chance to start your own brand, you have to prove to her (and the clients) that you're cut out for it. But this opportunity hasn't gone overlooked by your coworkers... or your competitors. Can you prove that you are the best perfumer in the industry?

Making of

I really enjoyed myself last year when I got to participate in FFS 2020, so I decided to enter FFS 2021 and see what I could do! I've been really enjoying pico-8 so here's another game made using it :)

For more details, I also made a devlog of the series which is available on Youtube.
